member.name: WINHTTP_EXTENDED_HEADER
member.summary: Represents an HTTP request header as a name/value string pair.

member.name: WINHTTP_EXTENDED_HEADER.pwszName
member.summary: A wide string containing a name.

member.name: WINHTTP_EXTENDED_HEADER.pszName
member.summary: A narrow string containing a name.

member.name: WINHTTP_EXTENDED_HEADER.pwszValue
member.summary: A wide string containing a value.

member.name: WINHTTP_EXTENDED_HEADER.pszValue
member.summary: A narrow string containing a value.
